TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class TextClassification : Java.Lang.Object, Android.OS.IParcelable, IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable

.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TextClassification extends Java.Lang.Object implements class Android.OS.IParcelable, class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class System.IDisposable
type TextClassification = class inherit Object interface IParcelable interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable interface IJavaPeerable

Docs.summary: Information for generating a widget to handle classified text.

remarks.para: Information for generating a widget to handle classified text.

A TextClassification object contains icons, labels, onClickListeners and intents that may be used to build a widget that can be used to act on classified text. There is the concept of a primary action and other secondary actions.
e.g. building a view that, when clicked, shares the classified text with the preferred app:
e.g. starting an action mode with menu items that can handle the classified text:
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns a list of actions that may be performed on the text.

remarks.para: Returns a list of actions that may be performed on the text. The list is ordered based on the likelihood that a user will use the action, with the most likely action appearing first.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns the number of entities found in the classified text.

remarks.para: Returns the number of entities found in the classified text.

Returns the extended data.
NOTE: Do not modify this bundle.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance float32 GetConfidenceScore(string entity) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the confidence score for the specified entity.

remarks.para: Returns the confidence score for the specified entity. The value ranges from 0 (low confidence) to 1 (high confidence). 0 indicates that the entity was not found for the classified text.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string GetEntity(int32 index) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the entity at the specified index.

remarks.para: Returns the entity at the specified index. Entities are ordered from high confidence to low confidence.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns an icon that may be rendered on a widget used to act on the classified text.

remarks.para: Returns an icon that may be rendered on a widget used to act on the classified text.
NOTE: This field is not parcelable and only represents the icon of the first RemoteAction (if one exists) when this object is read from a parcel.
This member is deprecated. Use #getActions() instead.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns an intent that may be fired to act on the classified text.

remarks.para: Returns an intent that may be fired to act on the classified text.
NOTE: This field is not parcelled and will always return null when this object is read from a parcel.
This member is deprecated. Use #getActions() instead.
